text: Chip 'n Dale Rescue Rangers is an American animated television series. The series was originally shown from March 4, 1989 to November 19, 1990. It had a total of 65 episodes. ==Main Characters== *Chip *Dale *Monterey Jack *Gadget Hackwrench *Zipper ===Villains=== *Fat Cat **Mole **Mepps **Wart **Snout *Prof. Norton Ninmul == Episodes == === Season 1 === # Piratsy Under the Seas # Catteries Not Included # Dale Beside Himself # Flash, the Wonder Dog # Out to Launch # Kiwi's Big Adventure # Adventures in Squirrelsitting # Pound of the Baskervilles # Risky Beesness # Three Men and a Booby # The Carpetsnaggers # Bearing Up Baby # Parental Discretion Retired === Season 2 === # To the Rescue, Part 1 # To the Rescue, Part 2 # To the Rescue, Part 3 # To the Rescue, Part 4 # To the Rescue, Part 5 # A Lad in a Lamp # The Luck Stops Here # Battle of the Bulge # Ghost of a Chance # An Elephant Never Suspects # Fake Me to Your Leader # Last Train to Cashville # A Case of Stage Blight # The Case of the Cola Cult # Throw Mummy from the Train # A Wolf in Cheap Clothing # Robocat # Does Pavlov Ring a Bell # Prehysterical Pet # A Creep in the Deep # Normie's Science Project # Seer No Evil # Chipwrecked Shipmunks # When Mice Were Men # Chocolate Chips # The Last Leprechaun # Weather or Not # One- Upsman-Chip # Shell Shocked # Love is a Many Splintered Thing # Song of the Night 'n Dale # Double 'O Chipmunk # Gadget Goes Hawaiian # It's a Bird, It's Insane, It's Dale! # Short Order Crooks # Mind Your Cheese and Q's # Out of Scale # Dirty Rotten Diapers # Good Times, Bat Times # Pie in the Sky # Le Purrfect Crime # When You Fish Upon a Star # Rest Home Rangers # A Lean on the Property # The Pied Piper Power Play # Gorilla My Dreams # The S.S. Drainpipe === Season 3 === # Zipper Come Home # Puffed Rangers # A Fly in the Ointment # A Chorus Crime # They Shoot Dogs, Don't They == Movie == * Chip 'n Dale: Rescue Rangers (2022) == Home video releases == ===VHS=== ====Video Chile: ADV Garantía Original Video==== Thirteen VHS cassettes contaning 26 episodes of the series were released on Argentinina/Chile. Drainpipe" September 18, 1993 Chip 'n Dale Rescue Rangers (Volume 13): Flies in Disguise "When You Wish Upon a Star" "Chipwrecked Shipmunks" September 18, 1993 ===DVD=== ====Video Chile: ADV Garantía Original Video==== =====International===== The Argentinina/Chile DVD releases was as the American release separated into three discs but has seven remaining episodes removed the third collection remains unaltered. DVD Name Ep# Release date Chip 'n Dale Rescue Rangers: First Collection (Volumes 1-3) 1-20 September 15, 2012 Chip 'n Dale Rescue Rangers: Second Collection (Volumes 4-6) 21-44 April 12, 2013 == Other websites == * * * Category:1989 American television series debuts Category:Television series by Disney Category:Animated television series Category:First run syndicated television programs Category:1990 American television series endings
